report

Class PingAppReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • report.Report
      • report.PingAppReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApplicationListener

    public class PingAppReporter
extends Report
implements ApplicationListener
    Reporter for the PingApplication. Counts the number of pings and pongs sent and received. Calculates success probabilities.
    Author:
    teemuk
